resources.string:
" The First Manner Water for the month of February is set to come up on the 21st by 4:30pm prompt. 
 Ministering live is Dr. D.K Olukoya. 
 Come and your life will never remain the same again. Come along with two bottles of water. One for your surrounding and one for your own personal consumption. Surely, your life will never remain the same again. Join us at MFM S-West 3 Regional Headquater. ..
 Minister IN-Charge: Dr. Samuel Oladejo Music Minister: Pastor Shola(JP).
 Developer @Bobo T, Dedicated to Olatunde Ifeoluwa Temitayo. Come and your life will never remain the same again. Come along with two bottles of water. One for your surrounding and one for your own personal consumption. Surely, your life will never remain the same again. Join us at MFM S-West 3 Regional Headquater. ..
 "
The image below is a description of the respective questions.Click to enlarge
